title: Monster ATV Racing Simulator Rally Cross

trophies.trophyDetail: You're a true legend of ATV racing! This trophy is awarded to players who have completed all other achievements in the game, earning every single trophy along the way. You've proven your skill, your dedication, and your mastery of the ATV racing circuit, and now you stand at the top of the leaderboard as the ultimate champion. Congratulations on becoming a true ATV Racing Legend!

Congrats! You've just taken your first step into the adrenaline-fueled world of ATV racing! This trophy is awarded to the player upon purchasing their first ATV, and it's a thrilling accomplishment that sets the tone for your entire journey ahead.

You're on your way to becoming a millionaire! This trophy is awarded to players who have collected more than 20,000 coins. It takes skill, determination, and a little bit of luck to reach this impressive milestone, so take a moment to bask in your success!

Time to pimp your ride! This trophy is awarded to players who have made their first ATV upgrade. By unlocking new parts and accessories, you'll be able to push your vehicle to the limit and dominate the competition. Congrats on taking the first step towards ATV greatness!

You're a natural-born daredevil! This trophy is awarded to players who have performed their first trick. Whether you're doing a backflip or a 360 spin, tricks are an essential part of ATV racing that will help you stand out from the crowd. Keep pushing the limits!

Faster, faster, FASTER! This trophy is awarded to players who have completed a mission at speeds over 80 km/h. It's a heart-pumping that requires both skill and courage, so be proud of your high-speed skills!

You're getting the hang of this! This trophy is awarded to players who have successfully completed the first level of the game. It's a huge accomplishment that shows you're ready to take on even bigger challenges and master the art of ATV racing.

You're a trendsetter! This trophy is awarded to players who have bought their first item and begun to define their own style of play. By customizing your ATV and choosing your own racing gear, you'll be able to stand out from the crowd and show off your unique personality.

It's not always about winning! This trophy is awarded to players who have lost a race. While it may not seem like a cause for celebration, it's an important reminder that sometimes, the journey is more important than the destination.

You're in it for the long haul! This trophy is awarded to players who have spent more than 60 minutes in the game. It's a testament to your dedication and passion for ATV racing, and shows that you're in it for the long haul.

You're unstoppable! This trophy is awarded to players who have completed 3 missions in a row without defeat. It takes a lot of skill and strategy to achieve this feat, so be proud of your hard-earned victory!

You're a collector at heart! This trophy is awarded to players who have purchased three different ATVs. Each ATV has its own strengths and weaknesses, so collecting them all will give you the ultimate edge in ATV racing.

You're a money-making machine! This trophy is awarded to players who have accumulated more than 50,000 coins. With this much cash in your pocket, you'll be able to buy the best upgrades and equipment, and dominate the competition.

You're a master mechanic! This trophy is awarded to players who have made more than 15 ATV improvements. By tinkering with your vehicle and optimizing its performance, you'll be able to outmaneuver and outrun your opponents like a pro.

You're a fearless trickster! This trophy is awarded to players who have performed more than 20 tricks. From backflips to 360 spins, you've mastered the art of ATV stunts and are always looking for new ways to impress the crowd.

You're a seasoned veteran! This trophy is awarded to players who have completed more than 10 levels. You've faced every challenge the game has thrown at you and emerged victorious, proving that you're a force to be reckoned with on the ATV racing circuit.

You're in it for the long haul, part 2! This trophy is awarded to players who have spent more than 120 minutes in the game. You've logged some serious hours on the ATV track, and your dedication is paying off in spades.

You're a true sportsman! This trophy is awarded to players who have lost 10 times in the mission. Losing can be tough, but you've taken it in stride and shown the world that being a good sport is just as important as winning.

You're a master of suspense! This trophy is awarded to players who manage to complete a mission in the last 10 seconds. With your heart pounding and the clock ticking down, you pull off a daring move and secure victory in the nick of time.

You're a money-making mogul! This trophy is awarded to players who have accumulated more than 100,000 coins. With this much cash in your pocket, you can afford to buy everything in the game and still have plenty left over.

You're a true champion! This trophy is awarded to players who manage to pass all levels in the game. You've faced every challenge, beaten every opponent, and emerged victorious as the undisputed king of ATV racing.

You're a mechanical genius! This trophy is awarded to players who have made more than 50 ATV improvements. With your skills and expertise, you've transformed your vehicle into a lean, mean racing machine that can outrun and outgun anything in its path.

You have purchased all items from our virtual shop and are now a true fashion icon! You have spent countless hours browsing the store, trying on different outfits and accessories, and perfecting your personal style. You are now the envy of all your competitors and the star of the gaming scene. you have earned the "Fashion Master" trophy!
